sql.if: AND (c.FIRST_BORROW_ID IS NULL or (c.FIRST_BORROW_ID IS NOT NULL and IS_FIRST_BORROW = 2))
AND c.FIRST_BORROW_ID IS NOT NULL and IS_FIRST_BORROW = 1

mapper.select: SELECT SUM(INTEREST) AS SUM_INTEREST FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord WHERE 1 = 1 and USER_ID = #{userId} and STATUS = 0 and IS_FIRST_BORROW=1 and FIRST_BORROW_ID is not null and FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID is not null

select SUM(REPAY_YESACCOUNT) AS SUM_REPAY_YESACCOUNT, SUM(CAPITAL) AS SUM_CAPITAL FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord WHERE 1 = 1 and USER_ID = #{userId} and (status=1 OR status=2 or status=3) and IS_FIRST_BORROW=1 and FIRST_BORROW_ID is not null and FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID is not null

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(c.REPAY_ACCOUNT),0) AS repayAccountTotal, count(c.id) AS collectionPersons FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c WHERE 1=1
AND c.`ORDER` = (SELECT `ORDER` FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord WHERE ID = #{repaymentId})
FOR UPDATE
